description:
This autumn will mark the opening of a major event organised by the Federation of International Vanguard Associations (FIVA), known as the G Quest. Those who conquer the 6 Branch Quests will be honored with the title Generation Master, and the chance to become a Clan Leader. The three members of TRY3 are all fired up by the new goal ahead of them, but behind the scenes, a massive plot that would lead to the destruction of Vanguard has been set in motion...
What is this Plan-G that http://anidb.net/ch69679 [Ibuki Kouji] is devising to achieve his mission about? What future will http://anidb.net/ch70498 [Chrono] and the rest achieve through their new encounters!?
Source: Cardfight Wikia

REGULAR.description:
Chrono Shindou and the rest of Team TRY3 teach a beautiful girl, Yumizuki Luna, how to play Vanguard at Card Capital #2. Just then, a broadcast is made by the Vanguard Promotion Association announcing the start of their big event, the G Quest!
Source: crunchyroll

Team TRY3 enters the first G Quest at Magallanica Branch, a team tournament that they easily dominate `til the end, when a specially-formed Aqua Force team shows up to sink them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スペシャルアクアフォース

REGULAR.description:
As the three simultaneous fights between Team TRY3 and Special Aqua Force continue, powerful new cards debut and Chrono holds his own against Leon Soryu until the legendary leader announces that the wind will blow five times!
Source: crunchyroll

A mysterious boy, Ace, manipulates Shion`s uncle and engineers a hostile takeover of the Kiba family business. The stakes are higher than ever as Shion fights Ace with the fate of the Kiba family on the line, not realizing that he stepped into a trap.
Source: crunchyroll

The TRY3 members help the Vanguard idol duo Rummy Labyrinth get ready for a performance. Novice idol and Vanguard fighter Luna wants to become friends with her strict, more experienced partner, Am, but seems to keep screwing up at every turn.
Source: crunchyroll

One stormy night, a haunted, dejected Shion runs into Kai. They have a series of fights in a nearby laundromat even as Shion fights his inner demons. Will the outcome be any help in the Dragon Empire Branch`s G Quest treasure hunt?
Source: crunchyroll

As the Dragon Empire Branch G Quest continues, both Tokoha and Chrono find themselves in "jail" and only Shion can get them out... by defeating the "guardian", Miwa! And he`d better do it fast because time is running out...
Source: crunchyroll

Shion is searching for Ace, the boy who stole his family`s fortune. Chrono is focusing on getting stronger for a G Quest victory. But Tokoha feels left behind and without a goal. She lends a hand at Card Capital, which is mobbed with people waiting for the tournament to start, and has a talk (and a fight) with Misaki, who`s been in the same position before.
Source: crunchyroll

Team TRY3 competes against Naoki, Shingo, and many others as part of Zoo Branch`s Quest. Only one person can battle the mystery fighter from another country, but first all the teams compete in a Vanguard cooking contest.
Source: crunchyroll

Continuing from last week`s quest, TRY3 has to make it past various enemies and obstacles in a recreation of the Megacolony criminal empire before they get a chance to win back their championship medals from this week`s "guest boss!"
Source: crunchyroll

After Kamui takes Chrono and the boys to a neighborhood bathhouse for some "special training," a heated battle ensues between them. Also, Chrono learns that everything he`s ever heard about the planet Cray and its inhabitants is real!
Source: crunchyroll

Team TRY3 goes to the Stargate Branch for the latest G Quest, but find it sparsely attended because it`s just too difficult. The quest: to beat either Toshiki Kai or Kouji Ibuki. TRY3 gets its first of two chances as Shion fights his recent, onetime mentor, Kai!
Source: crunchyroll

During the second half of their fight, Chrono and Ibuki get fed up with each other. Ibuki accuses Chrono of not improving since their last match, while Chrono is sick of Ibuki`s behind-the-scenes machinations. Can the two reach an accord and a satisfying ending to the fight?
Source: crunchyroll

Shin holds a shop tournament at the original Card Capital, which brings together a mix of old favorites and newer characters. Does Chrono stand a chance against the fighter who taught Kamui everything he knows?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: カードキャピタル一号店

REGULAR.description: After the tournament, Shin talks with Chrono and reveals that he and Chrono`s father Rive were friends and teammates. Knowing that Chrono wants to face Ryuzu Myoujin and despite warning him that he may die, Shin decides to have a cardfight with Chrono to test his resolve. During the battle, Shin reveals Ryuzu was involved in Rive`s death, which causes Chrono to worry that Mikuru will be put in danger as well. But with some encouraging words from Mikuru, Chrono makes up his mind; he will protect both her and Vanguard from Ryuzu.

Luna wants to get closer to her Rummy Labyrinth idol partner, but Am seems distant and even depressed lately. When Luna goes to Tokoha and Kumi for advice, they end up running into Am and one silly argument later, Tokoha and Am are having a Vanguard showdown. Will this unofficial "girls` meet" end with breakup or a bond?
Source: crunchyroll

After getting stronger through the G Quest, Shion lures Ace out for a fight. Will he be able to regain the Kiba family fortune through a win?
Source: crunchyroll

TRY3 participates in the G Quest at the all-new United Sanctuary Branch, which is now run by Ren, Tetsu, and Asuka {Asaka}. In the end, the members of TRY3 are pitted against Team AL4 {Asteroid`s Team AL4} in a new twist on a "relay match."
Source: crunchyroll

The new version of a team fight, Relation Vanguard, continues with Chrono up against Ren and several powerful new cards. Meanwhile, Myoujin continues plotting behind the scenes to force creatures from Cray into captivity on Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

While Kamui tries tracking down Ryuzu Myoujin at a seemingly abandoned Association facility, he runs into Mamoru, Trinity Dragon... and the operator of a dangerous high-tech security system.
Source: crunchyroll

Team TRY3 enter the final G Quest, sponsored by Dark Zone Branch, but it may be the hardest one yet as hundreds of opponents try to stop them from going undefeated in a haunted house-themed labyrinth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ダークゾーン支部の罠

REGULAR.description:
The members of TRY3 try to relax and prepare for their fight against the mystery "dream team" the next day, while Ren and company work behind the scenes to track down Ryuzu Myoujin before he can summon the final unit from Cray.
Source: crunchyroll

The first match of the ultimate stage pits Tokoha versus Misaki of the legendary Q4! If Tokoha loses, TRY3 won`t have the chance to help take down Ryuzu Myoujin, but does she even have a chance against Misaki`s incredible memory?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kessen! Team Q4 Tokoha vs Misaki
Showdown! Team Q4 Tokoha Versus Misaki
決戦! チームQ4 トコハVSミサキ

REGULAR.description:
The second match of the ultimate stage is between Shion and Kai. The formerly wealthy upstart has lost to the old pro time and time again, but never has so much been hanging in the balance!
Source: crunchyroll

It`s the third match climax of the TRY3-Q4 battle, Chrono versus Kamui! If Chrono wins, it means a complete for TRY3, but does he stand a chance against Kamui, who taught him everything he knows?
Source: crunchyroll

In the series finale, it`s a fight to the finish for Chrono and Kamui as the Ren and the others enlist the help of fighters all over the world to pinpoint Ryuzu Myoujin`s hidden location.
Source: crunchyroll

WIKIPEDIA_JP: カードファイト!!_ヴァンガード_(アニメ)

titles.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard G: Girs Crisis Hen
CARDFIGHT!! ヴァンガードG ギアースクライシス編
卡片战斗先导者G 齿轮危机篇
